name: Loz the Wall Jumper!
description:
This game was created for the LoSpec LTRO-1 GAME JAM!

This is a simple one level platformer with lots of wall jumping. I learnt a lot while making this game. It is my first game ever on itch.io. This game sadly wasnt able to be completed to the extent that I wanted to, due to the deadline of the game jam and life circumstances. I had so much fun being part of this game jam.

Here is the box art:

feel free to leave a comment!

I am open to constructive critisism, I will be glad just to konw that someone played it!
